title: Meta unveils Voicebox AI to replicate the voices of your friends and loved ones
description: The technology breakthrough was announced via a published paper. Though it's not widely available, you can listen to demos.

title: How to add a to-do list to Slack
description: If you've longed to have a simple to-do list in Slack, Jack Wallen has just the app for you.

title: These are the most hacked passwords. Is yours on the list?
description: Based on more than 6 million breached passwords, there are certain subjects and patterns you should avoid in your own passwords, says payment firm Dojo.

title: Most US workers want to adopt emerging tech like AI but see senior leaders as obstacle
description: More than half of surveyed employees say the emerging technologies are outdated by the time their companies decide to implement them.

title: How to use YouChat as an AI chatbot and search tool
description: YouChat is part traditional search engine and part AI bot. Here's how to use both aspects to track down the right help and information.

title: Apple Vision Pro too expensive for you? An iPhone-based headset may coming
description: Apple just won a patent for a device that could turn a future iPhone into an AR/VR headset.

title: Apple Vision Pro too expensive for you? An iPhone-based headset may be coming
description: Apple just won a patent for a device that could turn a future iPhone into an AR/VR headset.

title: iPhone users can now officially access Bing Chat from their home screen. Here's how
description: Bing Chat's latest wave of updates includes an iOS Bing Chat widget.

title: Who owns the code? If ChatGPT's AI helps write your app, does it still belong to you?
description: It's complicated. So we reached out to legal experts for some definitive answers.

title: Generative AI should be more inclusive as it evolves, according to OpenAI's CEO
description: How should generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools such as ChatGPT adapt so that they can be accepted by a wider global population?

title: 73% of consumers trust what generative AI wants us to see
description: Eager to use generative artificial intelligence to save effort and time, most consumers trust content created by such tools, including ChatGPT.

title: I bought some off-brand geeky stuff from Temu (and wasn't mad about it)
description: Will I order from Temu again? Read on to find out.

title: Get 408 hours of cybersecurity training with this $80 bundle
description: Save hundreds on this comprehensive IT skills training package, with topics like CompTIA certifications, Azure, Cisco, Python, risk management, and more.

title: Deal alert: Buy an annual Costco membership and get a $30 gift card
description: Save on electronics, gadgets, home appliances, groceries, home essentials, bulk goods and more at Costco. This deal lets you effectively get a membership for 50% off.

title: Your next job interview could be with AI instead of a person
description: Many job seekers already use AI to build resumes and cover letters, but employers are also using it on their side, with more to come.
